instructions.title: Spot the Bugs
instructions.description: Keep your eyes sharp and watch for bugs appearing on the screen. Different bugs have different point values and behaviors.
instructions.tip: Focus on the screen - bugs can appear anywhere!

instructions.title: Click to Whack
instructions.description: Click on bugs as quickly as possible to eliminate them. The faster you react, the more points you'll earn.
instructions.tip: Speed is key - don't let bugs escape!

instructions.title: Aim for Accuracy
instructions.description: Precision matters! Hitting bugs directly earns more points than grazing them. Practice your aim for maximum efficiency.
instructions.tip: Take your time to aim, but don't wait too long!

instructions.title: Use Power-ups
instructions.description: Collect special power-ups that appear during gameplay. These can help you eliminate multiple bugs at once or slow down time.
instructions.tip: Power-ups are rare - use them wisely!

instructions.title: Score Points
instructions.description: Each bug eliminated earns you points. Different bugs have different values, so prioritize the high-scoring ones.
instructions.tip: Watch for golden bugs - they're worth extra points!

instructions.title: Beat Your High Score
instructions.description: The game continues until time runs out or you miss too many bugs. Challenge yourself to beat your previous best score!
instructions.tip: Practice regularly to improve your reflexes!
